original_title: Neil Young & Crazy Horse: Way Down in the Rust Bucket
overview: After recording Ragged Glory at Broken Arrow Ranch in the spring of 1990 and releasing it that September, Young and Crazy Horse took the stage at The Catalyst in Santa Cruz on November 13 to unleash the songs upon a live audience.
tagline: Love and only love will endure
title: Neil Young & Crazy Horse: Way Down in the Rust Bucket
